job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd:
From: AMIT, SUS ap@susinfotek.com Reply to: ap@susinfotek.com Position: Database Admin
Location: Hybrid in Plano, TX
Duration: 12 month C2H
Phone and Skype USC
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
At least 12 years of experience as a Database Administrator or in a similar role.
Proficiency in database management systems such as Oracle, or SQL Server.
Strong knowledge of SQL and experience with query optimization.
Familiarity with database backup and recovery tools and techniques.
Understanding of data security and compliance standards (e.g., GDPR).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with cloud database services (e.g., Azure SQL Database, Snowflake).
Familiarity with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB).
Knowledge of database automation and monitoring tools.
Regards,
Amit Panthri
Sr. Technical Recruiter
E: ap@susinfotek.com
